name: Picnic
slogan: Save time & money while eating out

team.title: Co-Founder
team.name: Axel Amer
team.bioHtml:
Worked at Lastar, Stomwins, Blockrise, Lloyds Banking Group. Experience with Photoshop, Sketch, HTML, CSS, VBA...
UCL MSci Graduate with First Class Honours.

jobs.title: Co-Founder and CCO
jobs.description:
Be the Co-Founder of the next Deliveroo!

Picnic is a new app that will launch in 2021 in London allowing people to save time and money while eating out. We use a dynamic time slot model that lets people choose the start time and the length of their meals at the restaurant. They also order and pay via the app which means that they’ll be able to be seated and served within 5 minutes after arrival. 

We're looking for our commercial partner that will help us secure partnerships with both companies and restaurants and who will head up the commercial team. 

Requirements: 

-Previous entrepreneurial experience
-Strong negotiator and executor
-Excellent interpersonal, communication, teamwork and presentation skills
-Experience in a strategic partnerships or B2B commercial role. Corporate business development or consulting role a plus, with tech or food industry experience highly valued.
-Sharp instincts for the right opportunities. You will need to know how to navigate through the noise to find and select partners that are strategically and commercially valuable in the long term for both the partnerships team and business as a whole.

Benefits:

-Become the Co-Founder of a very promising company
-Equity based package
-Head up a team that will significantly grow in the next months
-Strategic responsabilities from day 1
-Part-time role (15 to 20 hours per week needed)
